step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain an upright head position.
Good hold. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're reversing the motion well. Focus on bringing your hands back to your lap smoothly.
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped in your lap.
Good movement towards your forehead. Keep those elbows tucked in a bit more.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head up!
Holding steady. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Smooth return to the starting position. Great job completing the second rep!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright head position throughout.
